entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore's brig ht blue eyes looked rather watery, and stared hastily at his own knees.

entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: ‘Scrimgeour wanted to know where you go when you’re not at Hogwarts,’ said Harry , still looking fixedly at his knees.

entities.name: dawlish
entities.description: He set Dawlish to tail me.

relationships.description: ‘Scrimgeour wanted to know where you go when you’re not at Hogwarts,’ said Harry , still looking fixedly at his knees.
He set Dawlish to tail me.
I have already been forced to jinx Dawlish once; I did it again with the greatest regret.
